title: 03/18/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/18/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Peter Dougherty about the Packers trading Davante Adams to the Raiders. The guys fail the American Citizen test. Tom Pelissero talks about possible landing spots for Deshaun Watson. And DP shares his opinion on Baker Mayfield's trade request. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
